brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Rivastigmine Capsules in Patients With Probable Vascular Dementia
brief_summary: The goal of this research study is to evaluate the effectiveness, tolerability and safety of rivastigmine capsules in males and females between the ages of 50 and 85 years old with probable vascular dementia.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Between the ages of 50 and 85 years old - Have contact with a responsible caregiver 3 or more days per week - Be male or a female who is surgically sterilized or one year post menopausal Exclusion Criteria: - Current diagnosis of severe or unstable cardiovascular or other diseases - Current diagnosis of active, uncontrolled seizure disorder, Parkinson's disease or Alzheimer's disease
